REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1214 reute d f BC-CANNON-INT'L-<CAN>-SE 04-09 0054

TEXT.TITLE: CANNON INT'L <CAN> SETS PHILIPPINES FILM PACT
TEXT.BODY:
Cannon International said <Viva Films International> agreed to exclusively distribute Cannon films in the Philippines for the new four years. The company said the agreement covers both theatrical and video distribution. Terms were not disclosed.
Reuter
